title: Niggle1981
author: Niggle1981
content: Has anyone used swapzone.io? I'm trying to find out if anyone has had a good experience with swapzone.io. They seem to have been around a couple of years but surprisingly little info or reviews on them.Failing that, could anyone suggest a reliable, anonymous crypto exchange to me? Thanks.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: swapzone.io is an exchange aggregator.I do not know how legit the exchange aggravator is, but you can use the one that we trust on this forum which is BestchangeYou can follow this link to access Bestchange website: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5217201.0

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: it is an exchange aggregator.they are disclaiming responsibility, and if they included good platforms, the results would be good and vice versa.I see they are listing changenow which has a bad reputation here.changelly has the same bad reputation.Save your time and use BESTCHANGE

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Quote from: Niggle1981 on December 02, 2023, 01:16:41 PMFailing that, could anyone suggest a reliable, anonymous crypto exchange to me? Thanks.I suggest looking into the following list too as they grade exchanges in terms of privacy or at least add note/s1. https://kycnot.me/search?q=&type=exchange2. https://orangefren.com/Personally, I have been using exch for instant swaps (best to use onion link), see ANN thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=577207.0
